There is no explicit customer complaint about AI accuracy/quality.

RESPONSE_DELAYS.reasoning: There is no explicit complaint about slow responses or waiting, and the initial response appears within about an hour per the CSV. While there are multi-day gaps between some messages, the ticket text does not clearly show the customer calling out delays as a problem.

PREMATURE_CLOSURE.reasoning: The last recorded support action requests additional diagnostic information to proceed, and there is no later customer reply shown. The ticket remained open for days afterward (with “stay open for one week” messaging) before being solved/closed, which is consistent with inactivity rather than closing while an active back-and-forth was ongoing.

This ticket will stay open for one week unless you reply with "This ticket can be closed" or update the status to Completed in the portal.
